history.content: The CS Advisors have committed to doing their best to approve the outstanding major declaration applications before phase 2 ends. If you are approved and if there are seats still open in the class, you will automatically be enrolled in the class. If you are approved and no seats are available, you may be moved closer to the top of the waitlist based on when you originally joined the waitlist compared to other newly declared majors.

I will be declared CS at the end of this semester. Since I’m on the waitlist right now for my upper div CS classes, I was wondering if the major declaration will get approved before Phase 2 for enrollment. If so, will I automatically be removed from the waitlist and enrolled into the class?
history.subject: Enrollment question for Fall 2021
